background_tasks.notes: All workflow endpoints schedule the async automation functions directly with BackgroundTasks; no asyncio.run() usage detected.

features.notes: All required endpoints, CLI entry point, and CORS configuration behave as specified; resume and feedback options still available.

synthesis_compliance.notes: Synthesis focused on verification and documentation polish; no regressions introduced.
